what: Overview of the NISRA Data Portal API
title: Introduction to nisrarr
text: package interacts NISRA Data Portal, allows users access data produced Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency (NISRA) variety machine-readable formats, interactively query, plot, map data. NISRA Data Portal built PxStat, dissemination system developed Central Statistics Office (CSO) Ireland. Guidance NISRA Data Portal available .

previous_headings: Overview of the NISRA Data Portal API
title: Introduction to nisrarr
text: can search data using nisra_search(), gives information available datasets last updated variables data. don’t know exact name dataset ’re interested , can search using keyword appears label set variables need:
code: library(nisrarr)  x <- nisra_search() head(x) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   dataset_code    dataset_label frequency dataset_dimensions updated             #>   <chr>           <chr>         <chr>     <list>             <dttm>              #> 1 VEHICLEACCESSI… Accessibilit… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-04-02 14:03:51 #> 2 INDTRUSTMEDIAEQ Indicator - … Year      <chr [3]>          2025-04-03 11:54:54 #> 3 INDTRUSTASMBEQ  Indicator - … Year      <chr [3]>          2025-04-03 11:54:02 #> 4 ARTCULEQ        Arts and Cul… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-04-08 09:30:00 #> 5 CULTIDEQ        Respected Cu… Year      <chr [3]>          2025-04-08 09:30:00 #> 6 FADPS           Northern Ire… Year      <chr [3]>          2025-04-10 11:17:42 nisra_search(keyword = "employ") #> # A tibble: 9 × 5 #>   dataset_code  dataset_label   frequency dataset_dimensions updated             #>   <chr>         <chr>           <chr>     <list>             <dttm>              #> 1 EMPVACHSCT    Employment vac… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-05-07 09:30:00 #> 2 EMPVACAA      Employment vac… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-05-07 09:30:00 #> 3 EMPVACLGD     Employment vac… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-05-07 09:30:00 #> 4 EMPVACDEA     Employment vac… Financia… <chr [3]>          2025-05-07 09:30:00 #> 5 KS605NI       Industry of Em… Census Y… <chr [5]>          2025-05-08 09:30:00 #> 6 INDEMPRATELGD Indicator - Em… Year      <chr [3]>          2025-05-08 09:30:00 #> 7 INDEMPRATEAA  Indicator - Em… Year      <chr [3]>          2025-05-08 09:30:00 #> 8 QEJOBS01      Quarterly Empl… Quarter   <chr [3]>          2025-03-20 09:30:00 #> 9 QEJOBS02      Quarterly Empl… Quarter   <chr [4]>          2025-03-20 09:30:00  nisra_search(variables = "Free School Meal Entitlement") #> # A tibble: 7 × 5 #>   dataset_code dataset_label    frequency dataset_dimensions updated             #>   <chr>        <chr>            <chr>     <list>             <dttm>              #> 1 DESLSAAA     School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 2 DESLSAHSCT   School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 3 DESLSALGD    School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 4 DESLSDAA     School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 5 DESLSDHSCT   School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 6 DESLSDLGD    School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-05-29 09:30:00 #> 7 DESLSADEA    School Leavers … Academic… <chr [4]>          2025-06-05 09:17:36

previous_headings: Overview of the NISRA Data Portal API
title: Introduction to nisrarr
text: can use nisra_read_dataset() dataset code found request dataset API convert tibble. Every dataset Statistic column value column, column time period, variables included breakdown:
code: mye <- nisra_read_dataset("MYE01T04") head(mye) #> # A tibble: 6 × 6 #>   Statistic      Year  Local Government Dis…¹ Broad age band (4 ca…² Sex   value #>   <chr>          <chr> <chr>                  <chr>                  <chr> <dbl> #> 1 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 0-15               Fema… 14076 #> 2 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 0-15               Males 14877 #> 3 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 0-15               All … 28953 #> 4 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 16-39              Fema… 22556 #> 5 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 16-39              Males 22771 #> 6 Mid-year popu… 2001  Antrim and Newtownabb… Age 16-39              All … 45327 #> # ℹ abbreviated names: ¹​`Local Government District`, ²​`Broad age band (4 cat)` #> # Source: Mid-year population estimates  library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2)  mye <- mye |>    filter(     `Broad age band (4 cat)` == "Age 65+",     Sex %in% c("Females", "Males")   ) |>    mutate(Year = as.numeric(Year))   ggplot(mye, aes(Year, value, colour = Sex)) +   geom_line() +   scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_comma()) +   facet_wrap(     vars(`Local Government District`),      scales = "free_y",     labeller = label_wrap_gen(width = 18)   ) +   labs(     title = "Population aged 65+ by sex and local government district, 2001 to 2022",     x = NULL,      y = NULL,      colour = NULL   ) +   theme(legend.position = "top")

previous_headings: Overview of the NISRA Data Portal API
title: Introduction to nisrarr
text: nisrarr functionality working metadata. can use get_metadata() function dataset download API fetch common useful fields, whether official statistics, subject statistics, contact information: need work fields programmatically, can fetch specific fields using get_metadata_field():
code: get_metadata(mye) #> Label: Mid-year population estimates #> Subject: Population #> Type: Official statistics #> Updated: 2025-05-08T9:30:00.000Z #> Note: [b]Description of Data[/b] #>  #> Notes: #>  #> 1. The estimates are produced using a variety of data ... #> Contact: Population Statistics #> Contact email: census@nisra.gov.uk #> Contact phone: +44 (0)28 90255156 #> Copyright: Crown Copyright (https://www.nisra.gov.uk/crown-copyright) updated <- get_metadata_field(mye, "updated")  updated |>    lubridate::ymd_hms() |>    prettyunits::time_ago() #> [1] "29 days ago"

previous_headings: Overview of the NISRA Data Portal API
title: Introduction to nisrarr
text: default, nisrarr caches data fetch data portal API speed repeatedly fetching data. Results cached 1 hour removed, cached values can ignored setting flush_cache = TRUE nisra_search() nisra_read_dataset(). Caching useful working interactively, better fetch data directly ’s part larger script pipeline.

what: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
title: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
text: nisrarr package accessing data NISRA data portal directly R.

title: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
text: Install nisrarr CRAN : Alternatively, can install development version nisrarr GitHub :

title: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
text: nisra_search() lets search dataset using keywords variable names, shows information like last time dataset updated: nisra_read_dataset() can used download dataset NISRA data portal data-frame: data portal also provides various types metadata, can accessed using get_metadata() get_metadata_field():
code: library(nisrarr) head(nisra_search(keyword = "claimant")) #> # A tibble: 3 × 5 #>   dataset_code dataset_label    frequency dataset_dimensions updated             #>   <chr>        <chr>            <chr>     <list>             <dttm>              #> 1 CCMSOA       Claimant Count … Month     <chr [3]>          2025-05-13 12:37:41 #> 2 CCMAA        Claimant Count … Month     <chr [3]>          2025-05-14 09:30:00 #> 3 CCMLGD       Claimant Count … Month     <chr [3]>          2025-05-14 09:30:00 claimant_count <- nisra_read_dataset("CCMLGD") head(claimant_count) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   Statistic      Month   `Local Government District`          value #>   <chr>          <chr>   <chr>                                <dbl> #> 1 Claimant Count 2005M01 Northern Ireland                     29573 #> 2 Claimant Count 2005M01 Antrim and Newtownabbey               1530 #> 3 Claimant Count 2005M01 Armagh City, Banbridge and Craigavon  2165 #> 4 Claimant Count 2005M01 Belfast                               7948 #> 5 Claimant Count 2005M01 Causeway Coast and Glens              2763 #> 6 Claimant Count 2005M01 Derry City and Strabane               4674 #> # Source: Claimant Count Monthly Data get_metadata(claimant_count) #> Label: Claimant Count Monthly Data #> Subject: Claimant Count #> Type: Official statistics #> Updated: 2025-05-14T9:30:00.000Z #> Note: The claimant count is an administrative data source derived from Jobs and Benefits Offices ... #> Contact: Economic and Labour Market Statistics #> Contact email: economicstats@nisra.gov.uk #> Contact phone: +44 (0)28 90529475 #> Copyright: Crown Copyright (https://www.nisra.gov.uk/crown-copyright)  get_metadata_field(claimant_count, "contact") #> $name #> [1] "Economic and Labour Market Statistics" #>  #> $email #> [1] "economicstats@nisra.gov.uk" #>  #> $phone #> [1] "+44 (0)28 90529475"

what: Help wanted / things that need done
title: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
text: isn’t much error handling moment. ’re using package get error message, please open issue!

title: Download Data from the NISRA Data Portal
text: package heavily based csodata, wraps identical API. also learnt lot reading code nomisr.

title: Get metadata — get_metadata_field
text: Retrieve metadata dataset, contact information, notes, official statistics status.

title: Get metadata — get_metadata_field
text: x nisra_df object created using nisra_read_dataset() field metadata field read. See details list fields.

title: Get metadata — get_metadata_field
text: Metadata field found, otherwise NULL

title: Get metadata — get_metadata_field
text: Every dataset following metadata fields: contact - contact name, email phone copyright - copyright information experimental - flag experimental statistics note - notes describing data official - flag official statistics subject - code label subject updated - date

title: Get metadata — get_metadata_field
code: mye <- nisra_read_dataset("MYE01T09") get_metadata(mye) #> Label: Mid-year population estimates #> Subject: Population #> Type: Official statistics #> Updated: 2025-05-08T9:30:00.000Z #> Note: [b]Description of Data[/b] #>  #> Notes: #>  #> 1. The estimates are produced using a variety of data ... #> Contact: Population Statistics #> Contact email: census@nisra.gov.uk #> Contact phone: +44 (0)28 90255156 #> Copyright: Crown Copyright (https://www.nisra.gov.uk/crown-copyright) get_metadata_field(mye, "contact") #> $name #> [1] "Population Statistics" #>  #> $email #> [1] "census@nisra.gov.uk" #>  #> $phone #> [1] "+44 (0)28 90255156" #>

title: Create a nisra_df object — nisra_df
text: ... named arguments convert columns, existing data-frame, named list columns meta List metadata fields

what: Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset
title: Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset
text: Fetch dataset NISRA data portal using dataset code. can search dataset using nisra_search().

title: Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset
Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset
text: dataset_code Dataset code flush_cache Ignore cached values

title: Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset
text: tibble requested dataset. dataset_code found, error thrown.

title: Read NISRA data portal dataset — nisra_read_dataset

what: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
title: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
text: Search NISRA data portal dataset. can search dataset titles either keyword regular expression, using dataset code, variables appear dataset. can also specify recently dataset must updated.

title: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
code: nisra_search(   keyword = NULL,   regex = NULL,   dataset_code = NULL,   variables = NULL,   datefrom = NULL,   flush_cache = FALSE )

title: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
text: keyword Text search dataset titles regex Regular expression searching dataset titles dataset_code Dataset find variables Variables search datasets datefrom Date search . Search limited datasets updated last three months specified. flush_cache Ignore cached values

title: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
text: tibble dataset information matching search terms. include dataset codes, label, frequency, dimensions, dimensions.

title: Search for a NISRA dataset — nisra_search
